verbs.description: [ARG0: jcope] [V: passes] [ARG1: sweeping lobbying regulations] [ARG0: the state lobbying and ethics watchdog panel] [ARGM-TMP: on tuesday] passed sweeping new regulations governing new york lobbying industry with the stated objective to address evolution in the field and bring it greater transparency by a unanimous vote at its monthly meeting the commissioners of the joint commission on public ethics passed the 92 pages of new rules which expand on what traditionally been thought of under new york law as lobbying bill de blasio walter mcclure lobbying seth agata michael rozen jcope andrew cuomo senate david grandeau joint commission on public ethics
